name: bet.fsl
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Automated brain extraction tool for FSL

inputs.description: Input image (e.g. img.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Output brain mask (e.g. img_bet.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); default=0.5; smaller values give larger brain outline estimates
inputs.name: Fractional intensity threshold

inputs.description: Vertical gradient in fractional intensity threshold (-1->1); default=0; positive values give larger brain outline at bottom, smaller at top
inputs.name: Vertical gradient fractional intensity threshold

inputs.description: The xyz coordinates of the center of gravity (voxels, not mm) of initial mesh surface. Must have exactly three numerical entries in the list (3-vector).
inputs.name: Center of gravity vector

inputs.description: Generate brain surface outline overlaid onto original image
inputs.name: Overlay flag

inputs.description: Generate binary brain mask
inputs.name: Binary mask flag

inputs.description: Generate approximate skull image
inputs.name: Approximate skull flag

inputs.description: Don't generate segmented brain image output
inputs.name: No segmented brain image flag

inputs.description: Generate brain surface as mesh in .vtk format
inputs.name: VTK format brain surface mesh flag

inputs.description: Head radius (mm not voxels); initial surface sphere is set to half of this
inputs.name: Head Radius

inputs.description: Apply thresholding to segmented brain image and mask
inputs.name: Threshold segmented image flag

inputs.description: Robust brain centre estimation (iterates BET several times)
inputs.name: Robust iterations flag

inputs.description: Eye & optic nerve cleanup (can be useful in SIENA)
inputs.name: Residual optic cleanup flag

inputs.description: Bias field & neck cleanup (can be useful in SIENA)
inputs.name: Bias reduction flag

inputs.description: Improve BET if FOV is very small in Z (by temporarily padding end slices)
inputs.name: Slice padding flag

inputs.description: Apply to 4D FMRI data (uses -f 0.3 and dilates brain mask slightly)
inputs.name: Mask-whole-set flag

inputs.description: Run bet2 and then betsurf to get additional skull and scalp surfaces (includes registrations)
inputs.name: Additional surfaces flag

inputs.description: As with -A, when also feeding in non-brain-extracted T2 (includes registrations)
inputs.name: Additional surfaces with T2

inputs.description: Verbose (switch on diagnostic messages)
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Debug (don't delete temporary intermediate images)
inputs.name: Debug Flag

output-files.description: Main default mask output of BET
output-files.name: Output mask file

output-files.description: Overlaid brain surface onto original image
output-files.name: Surface overlay file

output-files.description: The in-skull mask file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output in-skull mask file

output-files.description: The in-skull mesh file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output in-skull mesh file

output-files.description: The in-skull mesh .off file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output in-skull mesh off file

output-files.description: The out-skin mask file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skin mask file

output-files.description: The out-skin mesh file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skin mesh file

output-files.description: The out-skin mesh .off file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skin mesh off file

output-files.description: The out-skull mask file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skull mask file

output-files.description: The out-skull mesh file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skull mesh file

output-files.description: The out-skull mesh .off file from betsurf
output-files.name: Output out-skull mesh off file
